title: Composite diaphragm for lithium battery and its preparation method and application

events.title: Application filed by Institute of Physics of CAS

classifications.description: Separators, membranes or diaphragms characterised by the material having a layered structure
Nanotechnology for materials or surface science, e.g. nanocomposites
Rocking-chair batteries, i.e. batteries with lithium insertion or intercalation in both electrodes; Lithium-ion batteries
Manufacturing processes of separators, membranes or diaphragms

abstract: The invention discloses a composite separator for lithium batteries and its preparation method and application. The composite separator comprises a polymer base film, a vulcanized polyacrylonitrile ion-conductive particle coating on one side of the polymer base film. layer and an inorganic ceramic particle coating and/or polymer modification layer on the other side of the polymer substrate film. The polymer-ceramic composite separator can be used alone or in combination with existing lithium-ion battery functional additives, and a solid electrolyte can be generated in situ on both sides of the positive and negative electrodes through the formation process, and the composite separator can effectively inhibit the formation of lithium dendrites. Growth, inhibiting the penetration of lithium dendrites on the separator, preventing lithium dendrites from reaching the positive side, reducing further chemical reactions between metal lithium and electrolyte, effectively protecting metal lithium electrodes, improving thermal stability, mechanical stability, Safety, suitable for high energy density lithium ion batteries, metal lithium batteries, composite metal lithium batteries.
abstract_original: 本发明公开了一种用于锂电池的复合隔膜及其制备方法和应用，所述复合隔膜包含聚合物基材膜、位于所述聚合物基材膜一侧的硫化聚丙烯腈离子导电颗粒涂层以及位于所述聚合物基材膜另一侧的无机陶瓷颗粒涂层和/或聚合物修饰层。该聚合物陶瓷复合隔膜可以单独使用也可以和现有的锂离子电池功能添加剂联合使用，并通过化成过程原位在正负极两侧生成固态电解质，该复合隔膜可以有效的抑制锂枝晶的生长，抑制锂枝晶对隔膜的刺穿，阻挡锂枝晶达到正极侧，减少了金属锂与电解液之间进一步的化学反应，有效保护金属锂电极，提高了热稳定性，机械稳定性，安全性，适合应用于高能量密度锂离子电池、金属锂电池、复合金属锂电池。
claims: 1.一种用于锂电池的复合隔膜，其特征在于，所述复合隔膜包含聚合物基材膜、位于所述聚合物基材膜一侧的硫化聚丙烯腈离子导电颗粒涂层以及位于所述聚合物基材膜另一侧的无机陶瓷颗粒涂层和/或聚合物修饰层。1. A composite separator for lithium batteries, characterized in that, the composite separator comprises a polymer base film, a vulcanized polyacrylonitrile ion-conductive particle coating positioned at one side of the polymer base film and a coating located at the polymer base film. The inorganic ceramic particle coating and/or polymer modification layer on the other side of the polymer substrate film.

3.根据权利要求1或2所述的复合隔膜，其特征在于，所述聚合物基材膜为选自聚丙烯膜、聚乙烯膜、聚偏氟乙烯膜、聚甲基丙烯酸甲酯膜、聚酰亚胺膜、聚醚酰亚胺膜、聚碳酸酯膜、聚芳纶膜、纤维素膜、聚醚醚酮膜和全氟磺酸醚膜中的任意一种；3. The composite diaphragm according to claim 1 or 2, wherein the polymer substrate film is selected from polypropylene film, polyethylene film, polyvinylidene fluoride film, polymethyl methacrylate film, Any one of polyimide film, polyetherimide film, polycarbonate film, polyaramid film, cellulose film, polyether ether ketone film and perfluorosulfonic acid ether film;
      
      
         优选地，所述聚合物基材膜的厚度为0.6-30μm，优选为0.6～10μm，孔隙率为5％-80％。Preferably, the polymer substrate film has a thickness of 0.6-30 μm, preferably 0.6-10 μm, and a porosity of 5%-80%.

6.根据权利要求1-5中任一项所述的复合隔膜，其特征在于，所述聚合物修饰层为聚偏氟乙烯-六氟丙烯层、聚偏氟乙烯层、聚碳酸酯层、聚环氧乙烷层、聚环氧丙烷层、聚二甲基硅氧烷层和聚乙烯醇缩甲醛层中的一种或多种；6. The composite diaphragm according to any one of claims 1-5, wherein the polymer modification layer is a polyvinylidene fluoride-hexafluoropropylene layer, a polyvinylidene fluoride layer, a polycarbonate layer, One or more of polyethylene oxide layer, polypropylene oxide layer, polydimethylsiloxane layer and polyvinyl formal layer;
      
      
         优选地，所述聚合物修饰层的厚度为0.2-10μm，优选为0.2-2μm。Preferably, the polymer modification layer has a thickness of 0.2-10 μm, preferably 0.2-2 μm.

7.根据权利要求1-6中任一项所述的复合隔膜，其特征在于，在所述聚合物基材膜的另一侧具有无机陶瓷颗粒涂层和聚合物修饰层，并且所述无机陶瓷颗粒涂层在面向所述聚合物基膜，而聚合物修饰层面向外侧；或者7. The composite diaphragm according to any one of claims 1-6, characterized in that, the other side of the polymer base film has an inorganic ceramic particle coating and a polymer modification layer, and the inorganic The ceramic particle coating is facing the polymer base film, and the polymer finishing layer is facing outward; or
      
      
         在所述聚合物基材膜的另一侧具有聚合物修饰层，所述聚合物修饰层包含无机陶瓷颗粒。On the other side of the polymer base film, there is a polymer modification layer, and the polymer modification layer contains inorganic ceramic particles.

8.一种制备权利要求1-7中任一项所述的复合隔膜的方法，其特征在于，所述方法包括以下步骤：8. A method for preparing the composite diaphragm described in any one of claims 1-7, characterized in that, the method may further comprise the steps:
      
      
         (1)将硫化聚丙烯腈离子导电颗粒涂覆于聚合物基材膜的一侧；和(1) coating one side of the polymer substrate film with vulcanized polyacrylonitrile ion-conducting particles; and
      
      
         (2)将无机陶瓷颗粒和/或聚合物修饰层的原料涂覆于聚合物基材膜的另一侧。(2) Coating the inorganic ceramic particles and/or the raw materials of the polymer modification layer on the other side of the polymer substrate film.

10.权利要求1-7中任一项所述的复合隔膜在锂电池中的应用；10. the application of the composite membrane described in any one in claim 1-7 in lithium battery;
      
      
         优选地，所述锂电池为含有液态电解质的锂离子电池、混合固体电解质及液体电解质的锂离子电池、全固态电解质的锂离子电池、含有液态电解质的金属锂电池、混合固体电解质及液体电解质的金属锂电池、全固态电解质的金属锂电池、含有液态电解质的复合金属锂电池、混合固体电解质及液体电解质的复合金属锂电池或全固态电解质的复合金属锂电池。Preferably, the lithium battery is a lithium-ion battery containing a liquid electrolyte, a lithium-ion battery with a mixed solid electrolyte and a liquid electrolyte, a lithium-ion battery with an all-solid electrolyte, a metal lithium battery with a liquid electrolyte, a mixed solid electrolyte and a liquid electrolyte. Metal lithium battery, metal lithium battery with all solid electrolyte, composite metal lithium battery containing liquid electrolyte, composite metal lithium battery with mixed solid electrolyte and liquid electrolyte, or composite metal lithium battery with all solid electrolyte.
